segments.text: I'm starting to feel quite anxious just watching all of this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water pouring from that sink is alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s creating a massive, widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is bound to slip on that wet surface, it's inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that stool the boy is standing on is so incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's going to fall backward at any second; it makes me gasp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Broken dishes, a head injury, or at least a big mess are all possible outcomes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues her dish drying, completely oblivious to these dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her lack of awareness is truly astounding and frankly, a bit infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell at her to turn off the faucet and look around!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen, truly a precarious situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s hard to just stand by and witness so many potential accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
